name: Fantastic Backflip: Clean Version
description:
Alright Evelyn, time to go. No big deal, just getting up in front of the whole university and dancing my heart out.

Why am I doing this? I don't even know anymore. Maybe I don't even want this, really.

Well, it's too late now.

And besides--I won't be there alone.

__________

My Patreon. (Special thanks to my Patreon, Bluebirdplays)

My Twitter.

Fantastic Backflip is a game originally made for NaNoRenO 2016.

With the release of Fantastic Backflip Version 1.1, I decided to create two additional versions, Clean & Cleaner, to make the game more accessible, especially to a younger audience who may want to read the story, or is interested in learning ASL/Signed English. This is also the best version of the game for those uncomfortable with swearing.

Clean removes all swearing from the game, and replaces it with an alternative word equivalent in force.

Cleaner removes all swearing from the game, as well as as well as the option to perform a rude gesture at the dance contest.

Choose whichever version is best for you. The original version of Fantastic Backflip's swearing will remained censored. If you would like to download that version, or read what has changed in Version 1.1, please click here.

If you have any questions, comments, or critique: comment below on this page, message me on Twitter or Tumblr, or e-mail me at mninorbez@gmail.com. I'd love to hear from you!
